description: To view the data in a CXA list mode file, select File â†’ View Well Listmode in Helper (the file will then open in Excel if you have linked Excel in the FMAT software options).
The CXA file is located in the "Listmode" folder in the plate subfolder.
NOTE: The CXA file is named according to the location of the scanned well. For example, Ana05x0E.cxa indicates that the image data was taken from a well in column 5 and row E.
